title: Power Dynamos training in Kitende ahead of Sunday game – NTV Uganda
body_text:
Zambia’s Power Dynamos Football Club arrived in the country this morning and conducted their first training session at St Mary’s Stadium in Kitende ahead of their CAF Champions League second-round qualifier against Uganda’s Vipers Sports Club. The game will take place on Sunday at Kitende. Head coach Oswald Mutapa says his side is in Uganda to secure a win ahead of the second leg at Levi Mwanawasa Stadium in Lusaka, Zambia, next weekend. The winner of the two-legged encounter will qualify for the group stage of this year’s Champions League.
